description: Triangle in which k-th number (0<=k<=n) in n-th row (0<=n) is number of dodecads in Golay code G_24 containing k given points and missing n-k given points.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, Orbit and coset analysis of the Golay and related codes, IEEE Trans. Inform. Theory, 36 (1990), 1038-1050.
J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 278.
F. J. MacWilliams and N. J. A. Sloane, The Theory of Error-Correcting Codes, Elsevier-North Holland, 1978, p. 68.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
